entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brochet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:05 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
